title.rendered: STEDI ST3K 41.5 INCH 40 LED SLIM LED LIGHT BAR

content.rendered:
Introducing our ST3K Series 41.5 Inch LED Light Bar. Running 40 of OSRAM’s® finest OSLON® LEDs with a combination of 8 Flood + 24 Spot + 8 Flood reflector distribution forms a remarkable beam that pushes the wide beam out at 50° and spot beam at 5.8° all the way to staggering 1 lux @ 699m.

Built on our hugely successful ST(X)K LED & reflector platform but with a low profile design. Our ST3K range is designed specifically for the application that is tight on clearance but still commands maximum performance.

699 METRES LIGHTING DISTANCE

SLIM PROFILE, HUGE PERFORMANCE!

OVERVIEW

Our STEDI ST3K LED Light Bar was designed to bring a large amount of light to a small amount of space. With its small profile of just 63mm total height with the side brackets attached, you will find the ST3K is able to be mounted in locations like your front bar and grill whilst maintaining the factory look of your vehicle.

PERFORMANCE

The ST3K packs quite a powerful punch running off the same Pure Drive technology + LEDs as our popular Type-X and ST4K range. The ability to mount in tight spaces are its key trait as it can be mounted on your standard vehicle and prove to be a useful source of light whilst driving out bush with cars that don’t have the space to run some of our larger LED light bars.

BEAM CHARACTERISTICS

Easily comparable to our STEDI Type-X and ST4K range the beam type of the ST3K follows in line. Providing a strong penetrating beam with 699m at 1 LUX and 55m out to the shoulders of the road with flood beam, the perfect all-rounder with low profile has arrived!

DETAILS

MARKET LEADING PERFORMANCE.

ST3K-40L features 40 of OSRAM’s® finest OSLON® LED, selected for unrivalled efficiency.

8 Flood + 24 Spot + 8 Flood reflector distribution forms a remarkable beam that pushes the wide beam out at 50° and spot beam at 5.8° all the way to staggering 1 lux @ 699m 

True White 5700K Colour temperature offers stunning clarity and definition.

Our Pure-Drive™ circuit design allows 97% of input power to go directly to LEDs.

BUILT TO WITHSTAND THE RELENTLESS PUNISHMENT OF THE DEEP AUSTRALIAN OUTBACK.

Finished in 100% Polyester UV and abrasion resistant powder coat ensures that our bars will never discolour.

Pressure Equalization vent | Protects against water ingress, dust & contaminants.

IP68 | Dust & Particle tight + Water-proof up to 3 meters!

Environmentally sealed Deutsch ® DT-2 connector.

Protected against EMC and RFI.

Includes our Easy-Fit High Beam Plug and Play Wiring Harness which includes H4 and HB3 Adapters making for an easy connection to high beam. Unlike the copycat harnesses on the market, ours has built-in electronics making our harness compatible with even the most modern and sophisticated wiring systems

Backed by a 5 Year Replacement Warranty.

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

LED 40 x Osram Oslon White
EFFECTIVE LUMEN 8,250Lm
PEAK INTENSITY (CANDELA) 486,400cd
OPERATING VOLTAGE 10-30V DC
IP RATING IP68
CURRENT DRAW 8.6A @ 13.6v
COLOUR TEMPERATURE (CCT) 5700 Kelvin
HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium Extrusion & Cast
LENS GE™ Lexan
MOUNTING BRACKET Powder Coated 3mm Stainess Steel
BOLTS AND FITTINGS 3 Series Stainless Steel
BEAM TYPE Flood Spot Combo
LIFE SPAN 50,000 Hours
WEIGHT 3.475kg
OPERATING ENVIRONMENT -40 – +50° Celsius

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • ST3K 41.5inch LED LIGHT BAR
  • Stainless Fasteners
  • Stainless Steel Side Mounting Brackets
  • 12v Quick Fit to High Beam Wiring, Relay, Wiring Kit and On/Off Switch
  • H4 and HB3 adapters included
  • Wiring Instructions

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
